items.sentence: Tom didn't like to travel, but Mary did, so he ended up traveling a lot.
It would've been nice if Tom had listened more closely to what was said.
I'm sorry we're late, but we were caught up in the five o'clock traffic.
There's no way to explain this in a way that Tom will likely understand.
Listening to Tom cry like that, you'd think it was the end of the world.
